If you have plans to entertain friends and family this summer, then it might be time to take a look at your glassware stash. If you’re shopping for glassware that matches the sunny outdoors, check out this new set of drinking glasses from IKEA. They have a retro flair and are so perfect for summer, thanks to their fun pop of color.

What Are the IKEA PILLERSTARR Glasses?

IKEA’s new PILLERSTARR glasses come in a set of four and feature a mod painted blue stripe motif on the exterior of each glass. They’re the perfect 10-ounce size for juice, lemonade, or your favorite summery cocktails. And despite their vintage feel, these glasses have the modern convenience of being dishwasher-safe.

And reviewers can’t get enough of how lightweight and perfect for daily use these simple little glasses are.

“I bought these because they were lightweight and easier to hold,” one IKEA shopper wrote in their review. “They do not disappoint; very lightweight and good for someone with arthritis. The blue stripes add a nice touch of colour, perfect for everyday, able to put in the dishwasher and come out nice and clean, no fading. Love these!”

These glasses are a statement on their own, but you can also mix and match them with this set of mod striped glasses from Transpac on Wayfair. This set comes with green, yellow, red, and orange striped glasses (which is great for remembering whose glass is whose).

The Transpac glasses come in a set of four for just under $44, so they’re a bit of an investment. But the fun colors would really make a statement on any summer table.

It should be noted that these glasses should be hand-washed only, so don’t get them mixed up with your IKEA PILLERSTARS and toss them in the dishwasher after the party is over.

Mod stripes are in this summer! Grab the IKEA PILLERSTAR glasses while they’re still in stock for just $8 for the set and give your entertaining stash a bit of a refresh before your guests arrive.
